com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui

Interface AnswerField

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QuizzesComponent, QuizzesField

    public interface AnswerField
extends QuizzesField
    Field for the student answer. It should be included in the response form of the question and also in the review page. This object is always built from QuizzesComponentBuilder.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldType

        AnswerFieldType getFieldType()
        Get the current type of this answer field.
        See Also:
        Question.setAnswerFieldType(com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.AnswerFieldType), AnswerFieldType

      • setEditorInitialParams

        void setEditorInitialParams(java.util.Properties parameters)
        Set initial parameters of the underlying MathType. Allows to configure the size, color, background and other properties of the MathType. Call this function just after the constructor QuizzesComponentBuilder.newAnswerField(com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance, com.wiris.quizzes.api.Slot) or anyway before any direct or indirect call to QuizzesComponent.getElement(). If this field type is not AnswerFieldType.INLINE_MATH_EDITOR nor AnswerFieldType.POPUP_MATH_EDITOR, this function has no effect.
        Parameters:
        parameters - A key-value map of MathType parameters. See http://www.wiris.com/editor/docs/reference/parameters for a list of all allowed parameters. In JavaScript, this is a regular JavaScript object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the underlying MathType is already initialized.

      • getEditor

        com.wiris.editor.EditorInterface getEditor()
        Get the underlying MathType. Function not available in JavaScript.
        Returns:
        An EditorInterface object or null if this field type is not AnswerFieldType.INLINE_MATH_EDITOR or if it is AnswerFieldType.INLINE_MATH_EDITOR but the editor is not yet loaded.
        See Also:
        getEditorAsync(com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui.EditorFieldListener)

      • getEditorAsync

        void getEditorAsync(EditorFieldListener listener)
        Get the underlying MathType asynchronously. Function available in JavaScript. In JavaScript the editor code is loaded asynchronously only when it is needed, and therefore the access to the MathType object can only be asynchronous. The callback interface will only be called if this field type is AnswerFieldType.INLINE_MATH_EDITOR.
        Parameters:
        listener - An implementation of the callback interface.
        See Also:
        getEditor()
